sub_title: Founder | Entrepreneur | Strategy and Business Development Expert | Corporate Finance Professional
summary: Co-Founder of several start-ups including www.jemocracy.com and From Russia With Art. Specialties include: Strategy, Business Planning, Business Leadership, Business Analysis, Strategic Business Development, Brand Building, M&A, Project Management, Corporate Finance, Controlling, Forecasting, Reporting, Fundraising, Marketing, Communication. Languages: Russian, English, French.

school.name: International Academy of Business and Management (MABiU)

profile_positions.description:
www.jemocracy.com
Online start-up on a mission to make jewellery a new office staple. 
#JewelleryThatWorks
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.company: Artisia Limited / FROM RUSSIA WITH ART
profile_positions.description:
FROM RUSSIA WITH ART (www.frwa.asia) is a non-profitable initiative aiming to promote cultural and educational ties between Hong Kong and Russia. 
Success Story Award by Federation of Hong Kong Business Association Worldwide in 2015. 

Responsibilities include: Develop short-term and long-term fundraising and PR strategies; Oversee all the fundraising activities; Develop and raise the profile of the company in order to attract sponsorship; Coordinate marketing and PR campaigns; Manage financial resources & reports of the company.
profile_positions.title: Co Founder. Fundraising & Finance Director

profile_positions.description:
• Senior member of a global M&A and Business Development Team responsible for all aspects of origination and execution of equity, JV and debt investments linked to energy commodities trading
• Lead and built global transaction teams to manage evaluation, due diligence, structuring, negotiation of investment deals, as well as internal corporate approval process
• Evaluated and closed acquisition, restructuring and divesture deals in the coal sector In Russia, South Africa, USA, Australia, China ranging from $15 million to $200 million EV
• Developed business plans, asset strategies, investment proposals, and game boards across the energy space
• Managed monitoring and post-acquisition performance of portfolio minority investments
profile_positions.title: Sr.Project Manager (Assets and M&A) Energy, Transportation and Mining

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for monitoring performance of existing investments; benchmarking against investment targets and budgets; identifying issues and new business opportunities to enable commercial decision making
• Managed evaluation and due diligence process, tax & financial structuring for minority investment deals for the European renewable energy and global coal trading businesses
• Acted as an M&A advisor to various Cargill European businesses on investments and internal corporate approvals
profile_positions.title: Projects Controller - Energy Group of Businesses. Member of European Controllers Center of Expertise

profile_positions.description:
• Lead a team of 4 financial analysts working on controlling a trading business unit at consolidated level, and implementing management driven strategic initiatives
• Established and maintained consolidated BU management reporting and analysis processes, internal budgeting, performance statistics across 17 global locations
• Gained extensive corporate finance deal experience on numerous successful equity and JV transactions across the sugar business in Egypt, Russia, Tunisia, Brazil, Mexico, El Salvador, USA, India, Syria, Israel, ranging from $10 million to $100 million EV
• Developed Sugar Assets evaluation models, budgeting and strategic planning tools
profile_positions.title: Assistant Controller, Sugar Business Unit

profile_positions.description:
• Designed and implemented Credit Rating system for sugar trading counterparts across the globe 
• Developed business unit Credit Policy
profile_positions.title: Credit Manager, Sugar Business Unit

profile_positions.description:
• Worked closely with trading and execution teams in Switzerland, Brazil and Russia to coordinate rapidly increasing sugar import flow into Russia
• Enhanced internal controls around Russian program; improved forecasting, financial & risk reporting
profile_positions.title: Financial Analyst

profile_positions.description:
• Supervised a team of 4 accountants working on accounting, controlling, forecasting, and reporting in accordance with Russian and US GAAP accounting standards
• Partnered with commercial team in resolving issues and disputes with customers
profile_positions.title: Accounting Manager, Sugar Russia

volunteer_experiences.role: Fundraising lead for 10x10 chapter n Hong Kong
volunteer_experiences.description: Lead the efforts to raise funds for a 10x10 digital event in support of 3 grassroots Hong Kong charities that serve the most vulnerable people in the local neighborhoods: (1) Feeding HK - dedicated to redistributing surplus food from companies to those most in need. (2) Impact HK - provides the homeless in HK with friendship, food, shelter, education, and employment opportunities. (3) Run HK - on a mission to rehabilitate vulnerable refugees (with a special focus on women who are victims of sexual violence ) through sport, education, and beyond.  Over HK$1.3 mln raised!
